body.data:
**Yes.**

Berlin is the capital of the Federal Republic of Germany, serving as the seat of the federal parliament (Bundestag), government (Chancellery), and President (Bellevue Palace).[1][2][5] This status was restored after German reunification in 1990, when the Bundestag voted to relocate from Bonn, with the move completed by 1999.[1][2][3] All sources confirm this without exception or recent change.[4][6]
